settings.ggABZYy-2B6_text: If you have any questions or feedback after the service, please don't hesitate to reach out. We're always here to support you and continuously improve your experience.
settings.ggL-3Pu6n2K_text:
You can choose:

— Spare parts delivery for easy DIY repair; 

— Return & repair 

Once your machine arrives, we will promptly handle the repair within 7–10 business days. We will stay in touch to ensure it is returned to you.
settings.ggQMHl1Yki3_text: Our customer service team will contact you within 48 business hours on working days (GMT+8, 10:00–18:00) to confirm your request and guide you through the next steps.
settings.gguf9WDvzDz_text: Click "Service Request" on our website and fill out the form to initiate your service request.

settings.g6dqioj-Yfk_text: Rotary pumps, usually found in commercial machines, deliver quiet, stable, café-quality pressure. Meraki brings this pro-level performance to your home, far surpassing standard vibration pumps, which are noisier and less consistent.
settings.ggjxd095mCv_text: Yes, the Meraki espresso machine uses advanced PID technology for precise temperature control, ensuring consistent, flavorful espresso. The PID system, combined with a dedicated group head heater, maintains optimal brewing temperature at the portafilter, giving you professional-level results with every shot.
settings.ggskYmiieph_childItem_0: What’s the difference between a rotary pump and a vibration pump?
settings.ggskYmiieph_childItem_1: Does Meraki use a PID algorithm to control the extraction of water temperature?
settings.ggskYmiieph_childItem_3: How do I request a repair if needed?
settings.ghMbJMKxZvq_text: Each Meraki Espresso Machine includes a 2-year warranty. During this period, if an issue occurs, we’ll guide you through the best solution: for minor fixes, we provide replacement parts with clear self-install instructions; for major issues, we’ll arrange shipment to an authorized service center. The repair process typically takes 7 to 10 business days. Regular cleaning and proper use help prevent issues and keep your machine in top condition.
settings.gwkTmscSERP_text: Yes. We offer flexible installment plans through PayPal or Klarna, allowing you to spread payments over time.

settings.gg9hD6vpgPL_text:
I didn’t expect to be this impressed. The Meraki isn’t just another all-in-one machine trying to do everything – it actually delivers on all fronts. From grind to steam, every step feels precise, well-engineered, and thoughtfully integrated.

The workflow is intuitive, even for a detail-obsessed coffee nerd like me. The touchscreen is snappy, the PID control is rock solid, and the steam power? Next level. Microfoam comes out velvety and consistent every time.

What really won me over is the balance: it offers pro-level performance without the usual learning curve or maintenance hassle. It respects your time, your beans, and your standards.

Meraki isn’t just for making espresso – it’s for enjoying the process. Every single day.
settings.ggBh1u4cDxk_text: I’ve been using the Meraki coffee machine for several months now, and it has completely transformed my morning routine. It’s sleek, easy to use, and consistently delivers barista-quality espresso, cappuccino, and more. The intuitive controls and customizable settings make it a joy to use, whether I’m in the mood for a quick ristretto or a smooth latte. Highly recommend for anyone who wants premium coffee at home!
settings.ggZcugMcZJG_text: More Than a Machine – This One Actually Gets It Right
settings.gg_6InuuqX9_text: A Seamless Blend of Design, Precision, and Pure Coffee Joy
settings.ggvg4h1hJPa_text: I’m absolutely impressed with Meraki espresso machine! It’s almost perfect (everything can be a slightly better haha). I was very impressed with the workflow of this machine. It’s very easy to use, even for amateur coffee lovers like me! The result is always very good, all beans I have tried worked really good, coffee always taste perfectly balanced. What I was impressed the most was the steam wand, it’s amazing! You can make such a nice, smooth and velvet micro foam. And a big bonus it the design of the Meraki Espresso Machine, it looks stunning, everyone always compliments it.

settings.gg71dZKV2Dl_text: Meraki's professional-grade rotary pump delivers stable 9-bar pressure for every shot. This precision ensures rich, smooth, and long-lasting golden crema—unlocking full-bodied espresso with perfectly balanced flavor and aroma.
settings.ggfQLc2XveW_text: Meraki's dual boiler for brewing and steaming ensure rapid heat-up, powerful dry steam, and true multitasking, with espresso and milk ready in minutes using scheduled preheat.
settings.ggjvRXx-fyH_text: Powered by commercial-grade engineering, the Meraki machine brings professional technology into your home. With advanced precision controls, it delivers consistent, café-level results-shot after shot.
settings.ggq9-tnZ2g5_text: Meraki's fully integrated weighing system combines smart software, precision scales, and advanced sensors for an upgraded, effortless workflow. Enjoy consistently perfect espresso without compromise.

settings.gg4TRZJ7zw-_variantSelectionRequiredMess: Please select a variant to add product to cart
settings.gg9V4D5wXF5_text:
- PID Dual Boiler System

- Commercial Rotary Pump

- Integrated Precision Weighing Scales and Espresso OS

- Coffee Sense™ Technology

- Smart Mode & Milk Temperature Sensor

- TIMEMORE® Co-engineered Grinder
settings.ggKIaXW1BN7_text:
-Type: Semi-Automatic Espresso Machine
-Dimensions: 370*370*415mm
-Weight: 14.5 kg
-Pump Type: Commercial-grade Rotary pump
-Pump Pressure: 9 bar (Optimal Espresso Extraction)
-Portafilter: 58mm Professional Standard
-Brew Boiler Capacity: 350ml
-Grinder: Conical Burr, TIMEMORE® Co-engineered Grinder
-Grind Scale: 1 kg max capacity, ±0.2 g accuracy
-Brew Scale: 1 kg max capacity, ±0.2 g accuracy
-Temperature Control: PID Digital
-User Interface: Touchscreen (Capacitive)
-Steam Boiler Capacity: 550ml
-Steam Adjustment: 4-level
-Steam Wand: 360° Adjustable
-Water Tank Capacity: 2.0 L (Removable)

settings.ggLA24_IcIO_text: Commercial build, steady control, and exact precision crafted for home baristas.
